Title: Resolutely liberate Taiwan, save the Taiwanese people from their misery!
Publisher: Donghua junqu disan yezhanjun zhengzhibu (华东军区第三野战军政治部)
Notes: The original inhabitants of Taiwan were violently suppressed from 1945 onwards by the 'newcomers' of the Nationalist Party. Especially in the early 1950s, many people were persecuted as 'bandit spies'. A large penal colony was established on Bonfire Island (Huoshao Dao, 火烧岛), now known as Green Island (Lüdao, 绿岛), east off Taiwan.
